Settings.QueryText: SELECT ALLOWED DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Ref, DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Date, DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.DeletionMark, DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Number, DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Posted, DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.OperationKind, DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Closed, DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.OrderState, CASE WHEN DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Type = Type(Document.ProductionOrder) THEN DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.OrderState ELSE VALUE(Catalog.ProductionOrderStates.EmptyRef) END AS ProductionOrderState, CASE WHEN DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Type = Type(Document.CustomerOrder) THEN DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.OrderState ELSE VALUE(Catalog.CustomerOrderStates.EmptyRef) END AS WorkOdrerState, DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.OrderState.OrderStatus AS OrderStateState, CASE WHEN (DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Open) OR DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess)) AND Not DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Closed THEN "In process" ELSE CASE WHEN DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Completed) THEN "Completed" ELSE "Canceled" END END AS OrderStatus, CASE WHEN DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Type = Type(Document.ProductionOrder) THEN CASE WHEN (DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Open) OR DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess)) AND Not DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Closed THEN "In process" ELSE CASE WHEN DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Completed) THEN "Completed" ELSE "Canceled" END END ELSE "" END AS ProductionOrderStatus, CASE WHEN DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Type = Type(Document.CustomerOrder) THEN CASE WHEN (DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Open) OR DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess)) AND Not DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Closed THEN "In process" ELSE CASE WHEN DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.OrderState.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Completed) THEN "Completed" ELSE "Canceled" END END ELSE "" END AS JobOrderStatus, DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Company, DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Start, DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Finish, DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.ProductsAndServices, DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.KeyResources, CASE WHEN DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Type = Type(Document.ProductionOrder) THEN DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.CustomerOrder.Counterparty ELSE DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Counterparty END AS Counterparty, CASE WHEN DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Type = Type(Document.ProductionOrder) THEN DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.CustomerOrder.Counterparty.ContactPerson ELSE DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Counterparty.ContactPerson END AS ContactPerson, CASE WHEN DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Type = Type(Document.ProductionOrder) THEN DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.CustomerOrder ELSE DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Ref END AS CustomerOrder, DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Department, DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Responsible, DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Author, DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Type, CounterpartyPhone.Presentation AS CounterpartyPhone, CounterpartyEmail.Presentation AS CounterpartyEmail, CounterpartyFax.Presentation AS CounterpartyFax, CounterpartyFactAddress.Presentation AS CounterpartyFactAddress, CounterpartyLegalAddress.Presentation AS CounterpartyLegalAddress, CounterpartyPostalAddress.Presentation AS CounterpartyPostalAddress, CounterpartyShippingAddress.Presentation AS CounterpartyShippingAddress, CounterpartyOtherInformation.Presentation AS CounterpartyOtherInformation, ContactPersonPhone.Presentation AS ContactPersonPhone, ContactPersonEmail.Presentation AS ContactPersonEmail FROM DocumentJournal.ResourcesPlanningDocuments AS DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments LEFT JOIN Catalog.Counterparties.ContactInformation AS CounterpartyEmail ON (CASE WHEN DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Type = Type(Document.ProductionOrder) THEN DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.CustomerOrder.Counterparty = CounterpartyEmail.Ref ELSE DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Counterparty = CounterpartyEmail.Ref END) AND (CounterpartyEmail.Type = VALUE(Catalog.ContactInformationTypes.CounterpartyEmail)) LEFT JOIN Catalog.Counterparties.ContactInformation AS CounterpartyPhone ON (CASE WHEN DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Type = Type(Document.ProductionOrder) THEN DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.CustomerOrder.Counterparty = CounterpartyPhone.Ref ELSE DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Counterparty = CounterpartyPhone.Ref END) AND (CounterpartyPhone.Type = VALUE(Catalog.ContactInformationTypes.CounterpartyPhone)) LEFT JOIN Catalog.Counterparties.ContactInformation AS CounterpartyFax ON (CASE WHEN DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Type = Type(Document.ProductionOrder) THEN DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.CustomerOrder.Counterparty = CounterpartyFax.Ref ELSE DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Counterparty = CounterpartyFax.Ref END) AND (CounterpartyFax.Type = VALUE(Catalog.ContactInformationTypes.CounterpartyFax)) LEFT JOIN Catalog.Counterparties.ContactInformation AS CounterpartyFactAddress ON (CASE WHEN DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Type = Type(Document.ProductionOrder) THEN DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.CustomerOrder.Counterparty = CounterpartyFactAddress.Ref ELSE DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Counterparty = CounterpartyFactAddress.Ref END) AND (CounterpartyFactAddress.Type = VALUE(Catalog.ContactInformationTypes.CounterpartyFactAddress)) LEFT JOIN Catalog.Counterparties.ContactInformation AS CounterpartyLegalAddress ON (CASE WHEN DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Type = Type(Document.ProductionOrder) THEN DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.CustomerOrder.Counterparty = CounterpartyLegalAddress.Ref ELSE DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Counterparty = CounterpartyLegalAddress.Ref END) AND (CounterpartyLegalAddress.Type = VALUE(Catalog.ContactInformationTypes.CounterpartyLegalAddress)) LEFT JOIN Catalog.Counterparties.ContactInformation AS CounterpartyPostalAddress ON (CASE WHEN DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Type = Type(Document.ProductionOrder) THEN DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.CustomerOrder.Counterparty = CounterpartyPostalAddress.Ref ELSE DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Counterparty = CounterpartyPostalAddress.Ref END) AND (CounterpartyPostalAddress.Type = VALUE(Catalog.ContactInformationTypes.CounterpartyPostalAddress)) LEFT JOIN Catalog.Counterparties.ContactInformation AS CounterpartyShippingAddress ON (CASE WHEN DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Type = Type(Document.ProductionOrder) THEN DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.CustomerOrder.Counterparty = CounterpartyShippingAddress.Ref ELSE DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Counterparty = CounterpartyShippingAddress.Ref END) AND (CounterpartyShippingAddress.Type = VALUE(Catalog.ContactInformationTypes.CounterpartyShippingAddress)) LEFT JOIN Catalog.Counterparties.ContactInformation AS CounterpartyOtherInformation ON (CASE WHEN DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Type = Type(Document.ProductionOrder) THEN DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.CustomerOrder.Counterparty = CounterpartyOtherInformation.Ref ELSE DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Counterparty = CounterpartyOtherInformation.Ref END) AND (CounterpartyOtherInformation.Type = VALUE(Catalog.ContactInformationTypes.CounterpartyOtherInformation)) LEFT JOIN Catalog.ContactPersons.ContactInformation AS ContactPersonEmail ON (CASE WHEN DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Type = Type(Document.ProductionOrder) THEN DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.CustomerOrder.Counterparty.ContactPerson = ContactPersonEmail.Ref ELSE DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Counterparty.ContactPerson = ContactPersonEmail.Ref END) AND (ContactPersonEmail.Type = VALUE(Catalog.ContactInformationTypes.ContactPersonEmail)) LEFT JOIN Catalog.ContactPersons.ContactInformation AS ContactPersonPhone ON (CASE WHEN DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Type = Type(Document.ProductionOrder) THEN DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.CustomerOrder.Counterparty.ContactPerson = ContactPersonPhone.Ref ELSE DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Counterparty.ContactPerson = ContactPersonPhone.Ref END) AND (ContactPersonPhone.Type = VALUE(Catalog.ContactInformationTypes.ContactPersonPhone)) WHERE CASE WHEN DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Type = Type(Document.CustomerOrder) THEN CASE WHEN DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.OperationKind = VALUE(Enum.OperationKindsCustomerOrder.JobOrder) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END ELSE TRUE END AND (&StartDate between DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Start AND DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Finish OR &EndDate between DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Start AND DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Finish OR DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Start between &StartDate AND &EndDate OR DocumentJournalResourcesPlanningDocuments.Finish between &StartDate AND &EndDate)

v8:item.v8:content: Добавить в список заказ на производство
